name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Kadyrov's Chechen forces are entering the Rostov region.
The battle with the Wagner Group is about to begin

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Ukraine's famous drone commander "Mazhar" eats popcorn while watching a video of the Russian military coup

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the comment section of a video about the Russian civil war with the Kremlin in the background, netizens all flooded the screen with the words "Tiananmen"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Later, the entry has been restored.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Prigozhin left the Southern Military District headquarters in Rostov by car. He was applauded and people came to shake his hand.
According to some previous reports, he will go to Belarus.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After Wagner left, people took to the streets to prevent Russian police from entering the city.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution 
[College student suspected of jumping off building due to privacy leak] At around 1:50 pm on June 22, a student from Luoyang Institute of Technology fell to his death, and his family has not seen the student's body yet. 
At 1:20 pm, the student sent a message to his mother saying "They sent my privacy to the freshman group, I'm leaving, I hope my brother will take good care of you..." After seeing this message, his mother called his WeChat phone at least 6 times, but never got a response. Half an hour later, the student jumped from the teaching building. 
After his family arrived at the school, they were arranged to go to the hotel for negotiation, but they could not see the child's body, so they went online for help. 
At present, the school said that it has not yet learned about what privacy was leaked, and further investigation by the police is needed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
At the 2023 Urumqi Music Festival, a fan waved a flag that read "Liberate Taiwan, Reunify the Motherland" and was ordered to take it down, and then was taken away by the police.
The day before, someone raised a flag that read "Internationale Schonnerre Must Be Realized" and was taken away by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to online information, the police said during the record: "Don't think that you can file a complaint in the mainland, and you can file a complaint in Xinjiang," "You live here, don't you know what Xinjiang is like?", "You posted it online, and people in the mainland thought there was something wrong with Xinjiang."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 25, Xinhua News Agency’s official account published an article: ““Returning forests to farmland”? It turns out to be a pseudo-concept”, calling a halt to the “returning forests to farmland” campaign in various places.
The article stated that the expression “returning forests to farmland” is mainly a general term for the phenomenon of “changing trees to grain” by some self-media, which is a simplified and generalized “media language” rather than a policy concept with a rigorous definition and issued according to legal procedures.
It requires grassroots governments to correct “possible deviations in cognition, understanding, and operation”.
Previously, “returning forests to farmland” caused a series of disturbances across the country
In order to meet the target, some places laid soil on the cement ground to plant grain, some places planted mature corn on the green belt to make up the number, and some places tried to deceive satellite images with steel bars and stones.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Summary of past tweets
Chapter 3 "From Urumqi to Urumqi Middle Road"
This article summarizes the entire process of the protest scene at Urumqi Middle Road in Shanghai from the evening of November 26 to 4 a.m. on November 27.
At first, it was just a simple memorial ceremony, but with the constant intervention of the police, it eventually evolved into the most radical public demonstration in 33 years...

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Because there were too many submissions that night, there are some omissions in this article. If any netizens find omissions, please send me a private message to add the video. You can also forward others' tweets to me in the comment section.

Then this comment disappeared.
